dct_description_sm: California with indented northern coast. Destroit D'Anien and Agubela de Cato to north. Map shows California eastward to area of Apaches and Nouuelle France on mainland. Mer de Sud Pacifiqve. Title within scroll cartouche (top center).
As State 2, with “11” following “MEXIQUE”, in bottom right corner of map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
